From the Desk of Justia

ICYMI: American Bar Association Formal Ethics Opinion on Responding to Online Criticism

Many legal professionals struggle with responding appropriately to negative comments or poor online reviews. The ABA recently released a formal ethics opinion addressing the implications of such a response.

Google Ads Will Update Keyword Phrase Matching to Include Broad Match Modifier Behavior

Google Ads announced that they are modifying Phrase Match to include Broad Match Modifier behavior. They will be eliminating Broad Match Modifier altogether by the end of July.

JERSEY CITY, NJ

Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews is a system designed for lawyers to provide valuable insight from peers and colleagues personally familiar with the lawyerâ€™s work.

Lawyers who have received reviews will have a badge on their profile showing their Justia Lawyer Rating, a numerical representation of the reviews they have received. Our research shows that the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge is the most used search filter in the Justia Lawyer Directory.

JurisPro Expert Witness Directory

JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

General Surgery Expert Witness Not Allowed to Testify in Wrongful Death Case

A General Surgery Expert Witness was not allowed to testify because his training was in general medicine and not internal medicine.

Allergies & Immunology Expert Witness Testimony Not Allowed in Allergic Reaction Case

Allergies & Immunology Expert Witness was not qualified to opine on the standard of care of a pharmacist in prescribing antibiotics.

Marine Engineering Expert Witness Testimony Limited in Asbestos Case

Marine Engineering Expert Witness could testify on procurement of items used on ships, but could not opine on the duty to warn of asbestos.

Business Valuation Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Benefits Claim Case

Business Valuation Expert Witness could testify despite not being certified in financial forensics.
